DOC.brief_summary: DLBS1033 bioactive protein fraction extract Lumbricus rubellus earthworm . This earthworm come Pengalengan , West Java , Indonesia . DLBS1033 possess 8 major protein molecular weight 100 kDa , name Lumbricus Low Molecular weight Proteins ( LLP ) . This enzyme transport bloodstream via intestinal epitel . As drug consist serin protease enzyme , suspect mechanism action lumbrokinase , especially fibrinolytic antithrombotic . One study DLBS1033 conclude plasmin-antiplasmin ( PAP ) complex sensitive parameter evaluate fibrinolytic effect drug . But , clinical study evaluate pharmacokinetic drug . As pilot study , aim study evaluate biological half life DLBS1033 .
DOC.brief_title: Biological Half Life DLBS1033 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Male 1855 year old Body mass index 1825 kg/m2 Normal physical examination Patient still ability undergo examination give write informed consent Plasminantiplasmin complex ( PAP complex ) level 0514 ng/ml Patient cardiovascular disease , hypertension , diabetes mellitus , dyslipidemia Creatinin serum 1,5 x ULN SGOT SGPT 3 x ULN Blood pressure â‰¥ 140/90 mmHg Fasting blood glucose > 126 mg/dL Alcohol patient Took medication ( include traditional medicine , supplement vitamin ) 1 week study ) Patient bleed history unclear etiology Hemoglobin < 10 g/dL Thrombocyte count < 100.000/microliter Heavy smoker ( Bringman Index > 600 )
